DOC.brief_summary: A prospective observational study contain three arm comprise different therapeutic measure treat patient neuroendocrine tumor advance stage . The therapy arm include local ablative therapy TACE SIRT , surgery RFA peptide receptor radiotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Best Therapy Patients With Neuroendocrine Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : Prospective observational study compare ablative measure TACE SIRT surgery/RFA peptide receptor radio-therapy patient advance well-differentiated neuroendocrine tumor lymph node distant metastasis ( N1 , M1 ) Prospective evaluation Primary end point : time progression Secondary end point : survival , quality life ( EORTC-QLQ30 ) , weight , time hospitalization , Karnofsky index ) Non-randomized cohort study Number patient need group : 70 per group , 210 overall Evaluation response therapy every 3-6 month image , clinical status , weight , quality life , Karnofsky-index Cross-over allow therapy change
DOC.criteria: Biopsyproven neuroendocrine tumor ( WHO class III , TNM grade 12 ) Advanced disease lymph node distant metastasis ( N1 , M1 ) undergo cytoreduction surgery/local ablative therapy peptide receptor radiotherapy curative intent therapy possible Undifferentiated neuroendocrine carcinoma ( WHO class III , TNM grade 3 ) secondary tumor advance carcinoid heart disease require surgery
